name: Better Left Lost
description:
In an abandoned research station on an icy planet laid an entity that was forgotten for decades. After stumbling on a distress signal for the station, you head into the station to investigate. What lives there were better left lost and never found. 

This game is basically nazi zombies from Call of Duty. Planned features include more perks and more weapons. THIS IS A VERY EARLY BUILD. This was made in 48 hours for a game jam.

Credits:

Bugrimov Maksim - Alien Model and Animations
Jonathon Frederick - Map and Models
Ying Pei Games - Weapon Models and Animations

Activision - Sounds

Billy Argel - Font
Font Monger - Font
